thread.section_title: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Parisian stay
thread.title_full: Wonderful Parisian stay - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Elena K
title: Wonderful Parisian stay
text:
We spent a night in this hotel and we will certainly return on another occasion as it impressed us in a number of ways. Tucked in a cosy and quiet yet still central part of Paris with the Eiffel Tower looming beautifully above the area, it is a stylish, extremely well kept, recently renovated hotel with a kind staff and professional service.
We had a standard room overlooking the garden, which was spotlessly clean and well equipped.
Nice discovery!
